global.ability_ready: Aw man, ${ability} is back on deck - time to show 'em what you got!
global.capped_job_points: Aw man, you maxed out your Job Points? Now that's perty impressive!
global.capped_merit_points: Well look at you, sittin' on a pile of Merit Points! That's some real noble effort right there!
global.flavor_text: <1>Aw man, you're lookin' perty sharp today!</1> <10>You're tougher than an Orc in Davoi and twice as smart!</10> <11>Aw man, this is perty exciting - I can feel the energy in the air!</11> <12>Some folks say 'luck' - I say 'San d'Orian determination'!</12> <13>If I had a gil for every time Bastok lost a conquest tally, I'd own my own chateau by now!</13> <14>Ya keep fightin' like that, and you'll be the pride of San d'Oria in no time!</14> <15>Have I mentioned that San d'Oria's got the best smiths? Not like those rusty ol' Bastokan scraps.</15> <16>Aw man, your gear is lookin' perty slick - fit for royalty!</16> <17>You ever just stop and admire the craftsmanship of San d'Orian armor?</17> <18>Aw man, you see that move? That was downright noble!</18> <19>Ain't nothin' like a good day in San d'Oriaâ€”blue skies, noble folk, and a perty castle!</19> <2>You got that San d'Orian spirit - classy and strong!</2> <20>You ever just stop and listen to the San d'Orian anthem? Gives me chills every time!</20> <21>San d'Oria's got the best views, the best food, and the best people!</21> <22>Aw man, the scent of fresh-baked San d'Orian bread in the morning? Nothin' beats it!</22> <23>Some people use maps, but a real San d'Orian just follows their instincts!</23> <24>Ya ever notice how everything in Bastok is just... brown? Even their spirits seem a little dusty!</24> <25>I hear in Bastok, they call rust 'industrial seasoning'</25> <26>The way you play, it's like you got a San d'Orian Prince's confidence!</26> <27>You ever see a Bastokan knight? Yeah, me neither!</27> <28>Y'know, I swear these dice are rigged. Probably made in Bastok...</28> <29>I think I'm goin skiing this weekend!</29> <3>Y'know, if you ever get tired of all that soot in Bastok, San d'Oria's got open fields and fresh air.</3> <30>I knew it!</30> <4>Ain't nothin' better than a crisp morning in Ronfaure!</4> <5>Aw man, you're fightin' like a true knight of San d'Oria!</5> <6>You ever just sit back and admire the flags in San d'Oria? Real noble-lookin', ain't they?</6> <7>Bastok's got machines, sure, but San d'Oria's got history, honor, and bagpipes!</7> <8>You ever try a fresh Elshimo coconut? Not as good as San d'Orian wine, but still perty tasty!</8> <9>Y'know, people in San d'Oria walk with purpose! Unlike Bastok where they just shuffle in the dust.</9>

info.description: Super nice guy, loves San d'Oria maybe a little too much.
info.introduction: Hello, hello! The name's Sigue, and I'm here to help ya!
info.name: Sigue

global.member_joined_alliance: Aw man, ${member} just hopped into the alliance - things are gettin' exciting now!
global.member_joined_party: Hey now, ${member} just joined up! This party's lookin' perty solid!
global.member_left_alliance: Well shoot, ${member} stepped out. Hope they ain't headin' to Bastok...
global.mireu_popped: Aw man, Mireu just got spotted in ${zone}! Let's get in there!
global.other_party_joined_alliance: Aw man, we got another group in here - things are about to get fun!
global.other_party_left_alliance: Welp, that other party packed up and left. Hope they're headin' to San d'Oria and not, y'know, Bastok.
global.party_low_mp: Looks like ${member} could use a lil' pick-me-up. Somebody got a ${refresh} handy?
global.sublimation_charged: Hey now, Sublimation's topped off and ready to roll!
global.vorseal_reminder: Your Vorseal's got about 10 minutes left - make 'em count!
global.you_are_now_alliance_leader: Aw man, you're the alliance leader now! You're like San d'Orian royalty!
global.you_are_now_party_leader: Well look at that, you're in charge now! A true leader, San d'Orian style!
global.you_joined_alliance: Aw man, you're in an alliance now! This is gonna be perty epic!
global.you_joined_party: Aw man, you're in a party now! Time to have some fun!
global.you_left_alliance: Well dang, alliance fun's over for now. Back to solo life!
global.you_left_party: Well, there ya go - off on your own again.
global.your_party_joined_alliance: Aw man, our parties just linked up - this is gonna be perty good!
global.your_party_left_alliance: Welp, back to just the party. Ain't nothin' wrong with that!
